members.name: getName
members.comment: Get the username for the current NT user.

return: the username for the current NT user.

members.name: getDomain
members.comment: Get the domain for the current NT user.

return: the domain for the current NT user.

members.name: getDomainSID
members.comment: Get a printable SID for the current NT user's domain.

return: a printable SID for the current NT user's domain.

members.name: getUserSID
members.comment: Get a printable SID for the current NT user.

return: a printable SID for the current NT user.

members.name: getPrimaryGroupID
members.comment: Get a printable primary group SID for the current NT user.

return: the primary group SID for the current NT user.

members.name: getGroupIDs
members.comment: Get the printable group SIDs for the current NT user.

return: the group SIDs for the current NT user.

members.name: getImpersonationToken
members.comment: Get an impersonation token for the current NT user.

return: an impersonation token for the current NT user.

members.comment: Instantiate an NTSystem and load the native library to access the underlying system information.

name: com.sun.security.auth.module.NTSystem
comment: This class implementation retrieves and makes available NT security information for the current user.
